argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_relcnv | |- Rel `' A |
| 2 |  | #P_relssdmrn | |- ( Rel `' A -> `' A C_ ( dom `' A X. ran `' A ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- `' A C_ ( dom `' A X. ran `' A ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-rn | |- ran A = dom `' A |
| 5 |  | #P_rnexg | |- ( A e. V -> ran A e. _V ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl5eqelr | |- ( A e. V -> dom `' A e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_dfdm4 | |- dom A = ran `' A |
| 8 |  | #P_dmexg | |- ( A e. V -> dom A e. _V ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl5eqelr | |- ( A e. V -> ran `' A e. _V ) |
| 10 |  | #P_xpexg | |- ( ( dom `' A e. _V /\ ran `' A e. _V ) -> ( dom `' A X. ran `' A ) e. _V ) |
| 11 | 6, 9, 10 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( A e. V -> ( dom `' A X. ran `' A ) e. _V ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ssexg | |- ( ( `' A C_ ( dom `' A X. ran `' A ) /\ ( dom `' A X. ran `' A ) e. _V ) -> `' A e. _V ) |
| 13 | 3, 11, 12 | #P_sylancr | |- ( A e. V -> `' A e. _V ) |
